ayahs.ar: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
ayahs.en: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
ayahs.en: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
ayahs.en: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful

ayahs.ar: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا
ayahs.en: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
ayahs.en: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur

ayahs.ar: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
ayahs.en: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance]

ayahs.ar: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا
ayahs.en: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread

ayahs.ar: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
ayahs.en: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive

ayahs.ar: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
ayahs.en: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا
ayahs.en: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful

ayahs.ar: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
ayahs.en: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

ayahs.ar: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا
ayahs.en: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments]

ayahs.ar: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
ayahs.en: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold

ayahs.ar: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
ayahs.en: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance

ayahs.ar: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
ayahs.en: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass]

ayahs.ar: قَوَارِيرَاْ مِن فِضَّةٖ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِيرٗا
ayahs.en: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure

ayahs.ar: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
ayahs.en: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

ayahs.ar: عَيۡنٗا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلٗا
ayahs.en: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel

ayahs.ar: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا
ayahs.en: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls

ayahs.ar: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا
ayahs.en: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion

ayahs.ar: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا
ayahs.en: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
ayahs.en: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
ayahs.en: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively

ayahs.ar: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا
ayahs.en: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever]

ayahs.ar: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
ayahs.en: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

ayahs.ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
ayahs.en: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
ayahs.en: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day

ayahs.ar: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
ayahs.en: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
ayahs.en: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way

ayahs.ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
ayahs.en: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise

ayahs.ar: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
ayahs.en: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment
